channel.title: Posts on tsthght
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on tsthght

item.title: 2022 24th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《SpiderHead》@Netflix please report to the dock for remote field testing. what you want is redemption. 你想要救赎。 She kinda reminds me of you a little bit. When I am with you, that’s the only time I really feel like myself. What do I always tell you?

item.title: 《菩萨蛮 小山重叠金明灭》晚唐 温庭筠
item.description: 小山重叠金明灭，鬓云欲度香腮雪。懒起画蛾眉，弄妆梳洗迟。 照花前后镜，花面交相映。新帖绣罗襦，双双金鹧鸪。

item.title: 2022 23th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《The Curious Case of Benjamin Button》@Netflix When their son was old enough, he joined the Army. I’m sorry if I’ve offended anybody. This is my last will and testament. I don’t have much to leave. Few possessions, no money really. I will go out of this world the same way I came

item.title: 《虞美人 听雨》宋 蒋捷
item.description: 少年听雨歌楼上，红烛昏罗帐。壮年听雨客舟中，江阔云低，断雁叫西。 而今听雨僧庐下，鬓已星星也。悲欢离合总无情，一任阶前点滴到天明。

item.title: 2022 22th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《awake》@Netflix It’s a terrorist attack, for sure. I known you stuck your neck out for me to get this job. and I am so appreciative. We are on the same team here. 我们是站在一边的。 It’s just in case. 以防万一。 In the next few days,

item.title: 2022 21th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《blackhole》@Netflix I thought there are very interesting things in the universe to be explored. You really need to be above the atmosphere to see through to the emptiness space. We’re gonna take the first picture of a blackhole. It’s like a vortex in the universe in space and time. The darkest

item.title: Vscode for Markdown
item.description: 可以通过安装如下插件，让vscode比较好的支持markdown文件的编辑。 markdown all in one markdown preview enhanced markdown preview github styling

item.title: 《苔》 清 袁枚
item.description: 白日不到处, 青春恰自来。 苔花如米小， 也学牡丹开。

item.title: 曾国藩的一首小诗
item.description: 花未全开月未圆， 半山微醉尽余欢； 何须多虑盈亏事， 终归小满胜万全。

item.title: 2022 20th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《a perfect pairing》@Netflix Let’s go a lot of bold and a little crazy. 让我们冒进疯狂一点吧。 Uh, right. That’s why you’re snooping around her house. 是哦，所以你在她家里窥探？ Charm doesn’t work on me. 卖萌

item.title: 2022 19th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《The surgeon’s cut》@Netflix I wanted to devote my life towards understanding how we can save the baby in situations where the baby would otherwise die. He has been a pioneer. From my perspective, that is a very simple gesture which engages them. We are undertaking the procedure together. You know, I can’t wait to hold them and be a dad.
